name: Regina Gallagher
text: Mr.Calvin is a great counseling instructor.He taught me a lot.I would refer him to anyone who is going through any kind of addiction.

name: Courtney Lumpkin
text: This place is terrible. They had a patient that was fine one day, had a nose bleed and passed out and instead of sending him to the hospital they send him home but when he walks out the door he’s crying can’t talk and trying to take his clothes off. Trying to get info to get this prior patient help is a brick wall, they said they have no knowledge of anything and hung up on me twice. You really shouldn’t be in this field if you don’t truly care about a persons recovery or even well being! The coordinator herself is very unprofessional and rude!

name: Seth Barber
text: As a former client, and also a volunteer for a long time, this is the best treatment facility that I have seen. Of course, results vary, because attitudes vary, but I assure you that this program works if you choose to work at it. But as my personal experience, I have been clean almost 11 years, in large part to this program. I was changed by God through Jesus Christ. And one real reason I gave God a chance was because the staff reflected such a genuine love, I had never seen before. I wish everyone could experience this program, it is life changing. I Love God today, and I love this place.

name: devin long
text: This would be a great place if about half the staff was replaced. To some of the staff it's more of a money thing than a recovery thing

name: chip linton
text: They are only out for your money not to help a person trying to get sober they dont listen. Or try to help you this place is a joke.

name: Mondrecco Bush
text: I came to this Program almost 2 years ago.....I was at a low point in my life. I was facing a return trip to prison and had recently began using cocaine again and my life was spiraling out of control. This Program and the Staff here...have helped me more than I can say. I have been alcohol/drug free since my first day here and I now work here as a Counselor Assistant (they are helping me work toward Certification as an Addiction Counselor). I earned my GED since I have been here and I have developed a relationship with God....that I had never thought possible before. Rapha has honest dedicated Staff as well as all the Volunteers that participate with the ongoing activities here.  I would recommend this Program to anyone that is seeking help with addiction issues.......this place is so much more than just a Treatment Center.  It is a Blessing from God..........Keep Up the Great Work!!!

name: Barry Hooks
text:
I went to rehab after rehab and couldn’t stay sober. Rapha made the difference for me. I think their “no nonsense” approach to recovery made the difference. I needed discipline and personal accountability in my life – Rapha is where I learned that.
The guy that had the bad experience tells the story. Cell phones/electronic devices were prohibited and program fees had to be paid. When you don’t obey authority - things don’t usually turn out well. Today, God is my authority. Thanks Rapha for showing me the way.

name: Debbie Moon
text: This place is only for men, but they referred me out to a detox/rehab facility that was great!!!

text: This place is only for men, but they referred me out to a detox/rehab facility that was great!!!

name: Toni{JuneBug} Evans-Henderson
text:
The staff here are wonderful, they go out of their way to make sure their patients are taken care of which shows that they truly care for each patient. As a patient here that means an awful lot to me and I know it means an awful lot to the other patients as well. The therapist here offers free counseling which is awesome and is a very kind and friendly man. The receptionist doctor and nurse are exceptionally friendly welcoming and professional I would definitely recommend this place to anyone needing Suboxone treatment with no insurance but if you have insurance beware because even though they call themselves a Cash Only Clinic they have been charging my insurance company for my lab work which is pissing in a cup which show results right then.I believe they are very dishonest people from the Owner &rest of staff except the Dr's& Therapist.My insurance company reimburses for visit such as these and Emma&Erin knew I was filing for reimbursement but still billed my insurance.When one of the 1st things I was told when I started was "WE DO NOT DO ANY BILLING"Good luck if you go there but beware of insurance scam, drugs showing in test you've never done,if you have insurance don't let them get your cards.Im a Certified Medical Assistant myself&experienced in billing; what they are doing is illegal so they may not be around long....
#TRUTHREVIEWER*

resp.text: Hi Toni,  this post caught me a bit off-guard as I feel like I was nothing but helpful to you. I apologize if you feel that I was ever dishonest with you. However, I do feel that there is a misunderstanding. We do not bill insurance in any form and we were not charging your insurance. We don't even currently have a way to bill insurance as we are not set up for it. The drug test cups that are used in-house we buy ourselves- your insurance is not charged for this. The samples are sent off to an independent lab for confirmation. Once those samples leave our office, we no longer have anything to do with them. The lab is who will bill your insurance to cover their cost of the lab confirmation testing. The drug test confirmations are required for us to do in order to write medications for certain diagnoses. This doesn't have anything to do with our office, nor do we get any of that reimbursement from the labs, as it is a completely separate entity. The only thing we get from the lab are the results of that confirmation testing. The new patient paperwork has a page dedicated to the drug testing and explains all of the above in it- which all patients initial and sign this sheet. I do feel as if it is unfair to accuse me of this and wish you would have brought your concerns to me.  I hope that this has helped clear up the misunderstanding, and I hope that if you have any further concerns you bring them to me directly as I will be happy to help. Thanks- Emma

name: Jake Moody
text:
Professional, courteous, and attentive staff. A very friendly environment as well. Affordable prices are a relief and the doctor that I have seen has been wonderful. He actually listens to me when I talk and never rushes through the 1 on 1 time of the appointment.
A++++ From Me!👍👍👍

name: jeff b
text:
The staff is very friendly and always helpful! They have gone out of their way on more than one occasion to make sure my prescription was filled, even when my insurance was not very cooperative. They truly care about my health!
Dr McShann is thorough, but doesnt take up your whole day for an appointment. He listens to your questions and/or concerns, and makes sure you and he are on the same page.
He's a great doctor!
I would definitely advise anyone needing their help to call an make an appointment!

name: Shannon Stokely
text: Made it very easy for someone who has been struggling with addiction for 12 years to make a fresh start. Clean and cozy place. Very welcoming, very understanding & don't mind driving over 2 hours to remain a patient of this clinic.. really don't think I could find a better place to help me get my life back.

name: The Woke Unicorn
text: Focus Medical Group has absolutely helped me and my family. The staff is friendly and empathetic. I've witnessed and personally experienced each member of the team interacting with patients in a loving and hopeful manner. The road to recovery is arduous, and requires the proverbial village, but with a total treatment plan and genuinely connected medical team recovery is attainable. Of course you must also add to this equation a willing patient and family, and if you are looking into Suboxone then you already understand the recitivism rate in relation to treatment. The prices for Suboxone treatment are typical, but the true win is loving and caring people like Mr. Steakley and Mrs. Erin. Thanks again guys. ❤️

name: Sweet Home Alabama
text: Honest review from former patient that easily found an overall better place to go. MONEY. That is all that is on the guys mind that runs the place. Be prepared to pay around 600$ for your first month's visits. Part of that goes to the counselor that you must see. She is 80 years old and will tell you the same things you have probably already heard. This place is cheap in every way. The office has the worst layout. During your wait, which is at least an hour, you will sit on an old stained uncomfortable chair right next to someone else. The place is tiny. He does not have air conditioning and only props the back door open. There are no magazines at all or anything else to occupy your hour wait. Only watch the guy behind the desk answer calls, collect and count money, and get folders ready for the docotor. Work which 2 or 3 people should be doing. No wonder my papers were lost multiple times that I had to re-do because of him. He tried charging me again a few times because he forgot he did because of his multitasking. Instead of paying someone to have things organized he saves the money and does it all himself. Office consists of himself, counselor, doctor, and a drug tester. The only bathroom has no running water at the sink and is filthy. You or anyone else can not wash their hands after being drug tested. When you finally make it in the doctors office, which is just a desk and a chair across from his, the doctor will give you the lowest amount possible prescription that you will pay an outrageous amount for to get. They offer no discount card and don't even mention it because they make more money. Which all the other places give you a discount card. This place only sees people on Tuesdays. So if you don't make it you are in trouble for a week basically. The place is very unorganized and unprofessional, but charge you as much as they can get off you. If this review doesn't sway you to another place, then you will see first hand when you go to there that I was being honest about everything I mentioned. Good luck in your search and I wish you the best.

resp.text:
I am sorry it seems you did not get what you wanted when you came here. However, nothing you posted is accurate. Let me point out below:

1. Focus definitely doesn't charge anywhere near $600 and is actually one the cheapest clinics around.
2. There is a counselor that is available to see if the patient wants to, but the patient is not forced to see her.
3. The fact you complained about having to sit in a chair "right next to someone else" is ridiculous. Any waiting room has chairs right next to each other. However, Focus has two waiting areas, so if you don't like the front waiting area, the patient is more than welcome to wait in the back waiting area.
4. There is air conditioning. Period. Always have, always will.
5. There are magazines that sit on the front counter to the far left next to the wall. Right next to the coupons (we will get to that later).
6. Focus is a small business. Two employees (one in the front, one in the back) plus a doctor is common and  was adequate. However, now Focus has added some new employees.
7. There are two bathrooms; male and female. Both have always had running water. Focus does ask for patients to not flush or wash their hands until they bring the urine sample out, which is common anywhere for drug testing in order to try to keep people from bringing in or manipulating urine samples. They tell the patient to go back in and flush and wash hands immediately. Gross. This is probably the most ridiculous statement thus far.
9. The doctors offices is a desk and a chair. What do other doctors offices look like? This is what any doctors office Ive ever been in has looked like. Were you expecting exam tables in an office that doesn't do exams? Focus isn't a "doctors office". They see patients for addiction and nothing else.
10. As far as the doctor giving the patient "the lowest amount possible", this is up for individual discretion. Focus doctors try not to over prescribe medications, as all doctors should try to do. Each patient is given whatever amount the doctor thinks is necessary for that patient.
11. Focus has always offered discount cards. There are cards on the front counter, to the far left (next to the magazines). There are also some behind the front desk that patients may ask for when they need one or that are offered to new patients. The part that says "dont even mention it because they make money" is ignorant. They aren't a pharmacy. Focus makes no money on anything outside of that initial payment you pay at the beginning of the appointment; no money off the prescription or medication; no money off counseling; nothing extra.
12. Lastly, there aren't appointments only on Tuesday. Focus has doctors here Monday- Friday rotating between morning clinics, day time clinics, and night time clinics.

I'm sorry that you had a bad experience, or that you didn't get what you wanted and you felt you had to post such a message, however, there are people at all clinics of every genre that wont be happy with something. Focus goes above and beyond to try to help each patient individually and will continue to do so.

name: LIQUID FX
text:
I heard this place was good but wasn't sure.  I really just had some questions.  I am already on suboxone but I don't have a prescription.  How much is this place for the first visit and subsequent visits? I know this isn't a review but I was hesitant to call bc I didn't want to turned away.

Update: it's about 250 for the first visit and 180 per visit after that. The medication is cheap with insurance but expensive without   Like 375 and that is with a discount card. Overall it's worth it but be warned if u stop suboxone you will probably get withdrawals from it. They are not as bad as other drugs but still it is definitely addictive but so much safer than the alternative being that you can't really overdose on suboxone. As am addict you may take more than directed or try to at times and it just doesn't really do anything. A small piece is almost the same as a whole one after you've been on it a while. Whoever invented this is a genius.

name: Kameren Fields
text: The people are very friendly and they dont judge. O was embarrassed about my past, but they really do care about you and encourage you to get wellnand on the right path.

name: stevekluther
text: Focus is great! They are above & beyond any clinic out there. Always accommodating & friendly.

name: Terry Thompson
text: My wife has been coming here for three years....best thing she ever did...

name: John Steakley
text: I'm glad to be a part of the Focus team. We really do want to be a part of your recovery story.

name: James Flanagan
text: Great place I have been going there for a little over a month and each time I go they are very friendly and the doctors are great there are some bad reviews on here and let me be the first to tell you that they are people who didn’t follow the rules and got in trouble and or kicked out and that’s why they’re mad and saying the things that they are saying another words they are ignorant

name: Kev Henderson
text: They have helped me in every way!!! Great place for a fresh start!!!!!!!!!!!

name: Andrew Reynolds
text: I’ve seen many lives changed through His Way recovery center. The common views expressed by residents is they feel loved and cared about when they enter the program. His Way is about planting seeds in men’s lives to show them there is a better way of living which is found through Christ.

name: Chase McClure
text: God loves me and I him. I put all my trust in him today abr nobody else not even myself. Thank you God and the people at his way

name: Darryl Floyd
text: Christ-Centered Recovery Center for Men

name: adam clemons
text: I just graduated his ways six month program and I'm doing great still clean and sober

name: Alex Wright
text: Great staff

name: sidney Minnifield
text: Tiffany is awesome!!!!

name: Brenda Collins
text: Recovery is what you make it, but this place sure does help make it a whole lot easier to get there. Everyone gets treated with respect here...you get what you put in. The rules are simple and as long as you can follow the rules. The help you need is available. This is my third time coming here and to be honest I wish I had stuck it out the first couple of times but the third times a charm and I am ready to make it work!!! Great place great people!!!!

name: Lil Devil
text: This place has really helped me. I love my counselor she is very easy to talk to and does NOT judge at all. A few people do judge us, they only work there to get a pay check not bc they want to help. Other then that everyone has been really nice. I haven't had any issues so far.

name: Chris Torrisi
text:
I have been a patient here for over 15 years and was actually one of the very first patients when the clinic opened. I've seen a lot of changes throughout the years and although they weren't all good, none of them have been that bad either.

That is, until now.

Although I have been completely clean from opiate abuse for all these years, the way this clinic is being ran now is making me consider going back to street drugs. Changing clinics isn't an option for me right now because I work so much and don't have time to drive that far.

Since BHG has taken over this clinic, it's just not the same. The staff obviously hates their jobs (they can be heard complaining all the time) and it affects the way they treat the patients. It's about a "bottom line" for BHG, which is money, and that is it. Recently, when I noticed a break in procedure that could have affected my urinalysis results, instead of an apology I got laughed at and made fun of by the head dosing nurse and then berated, screamed at, & cussed out by Dr. Holland, who has apparently become disgruntled and unstable, right in the lobby in front of everyone.

So no, I do not recommend anyone come here for treatment! Not anymore, anyway.

name: susan bagwell
text: I thank God  for this place its save my life . ,

name: Patrina Jones
text: Great place. Nice people. No problems

name: jacob hummel
text: Do they prescribe Methadone here?

name: Matthew Carter
text: Above all its a great program for anyone with not only addictions but also treatment for chronic pain

name: Megan Cryer
text: This place has been a LIFESAVER!! Has made my life so much better!!

name: Sandra Gray
text: My son is there , he works very hard and obeys all the rules to a t, it's not the faculty building , it's the staff , my son was there 6 days and obtained a I'd, his 7th day obtained employment,  but I can assure you it was not with the help of the staff , they are rude to everyone , I researched their mission , and none of the resources have been made available to my son , all he has accomplished thus far have been his and the families due diligence  to ensure he succeeds , maybe the staff needs additional  training , hopefully the staff can improve their people and management skills , and my son is paying 25 percent of his gross earnings to be there , so he is not getting a free ride as most would think

name: Donzetta Crum
text: The Director and staff work extremely hard to be fair under the circumstances and conditions the job requires. We all know that by following the rules, they may never get the popularity vote, however sometimes one bad apple can leave some people with a sour outlook on others. The experience you receive there is all based on YOU making the best out of the situation. Also understand you don't want to like it there.. otherwise you may want to return and that's what they want you to avoid doing. I'm truly sorry if anyone had a bad experience.. But I do believe it was better than the alternative.

name: Jacques T
text: Very unprofessional and rude..

name: Tammy Richardson
text: This place is a joke and it is run by nothing but prejudice black females. If you are white the set you up to fall. My son is there and they constantly tell him they are going to see him back in prison.

name: Nathan Crosby
text: I Love To See My Dad There.

name: Ray Frye
text: Keeton Corrections DOES NOT offer any assistance to the transition residence that live there. They do not provide transportation to or from work, they do not assist people in finding jobs, if your on medication th hey will not pick it up from the pharmacy for you if you dont have transportation.  But every paycheck  they get 25% of your gross pay. They are taking 25% of a persons paycheck that is trying to buy transportation,  obtain housing, provide for their family, etc. Keeton Corrections is a BIG RIP-OFF  OF TAX PAYERS MONEY AND SHOULD BE SHUT DOWN.

name: Sean And Gypsy Holleman
text: The only reason i gave it 1 star was so i could leave this review. I read what others were saying...my son was taken for 40% of his gross income and given so many alcohol and drugtest he would be broke and still owed them money. My father ...his grandfather plus my husband and i were having to send money and bring him food. He was actually getting into more debt. He had fines to pay for the courts but no money left to pay on it. Actually we have been making payments for him also. The staff is rude and awful and treat you as if you are visiting them in prison.

name: Sherketia Keys
text: This place is horrible and should've been shut down in 2013. Majority of the staff are very unprofessional and under trained. Several of them have had relations and relationships with the clients that was in this release center.

name: Mary Pettit
text: The employees here are the rudest pieces of dirt I've ever met!!!

name: Jonathan Mixson
text: I want to say I've not yet made my way to the foundry yet but I'm waiting on my bed to open up. I've watched the videos on YouTube of the pastor speaking. An I've got to say I can't wait to be there in person. I've been a long time meth atic but I've got to say that I've always kept my faith in Jesus christ. An lord knows I've repented an awful lot. Its time that I change my life around an go hard for God. An I can see that the foundry an there staff are gonna help me do just that. Can't wait to see you guys.  Much love family. See. U soon. God bless you all🙏🙏

name: John Roland
text: The Foundry Farm is an amazing and special place. It is a wonderful location and environment for men to become reshaped and restored. The staff is fully dedicated to pouring their lives into the men. I highly recommend it.

name: Dottie I Brooks
text: Very nice place for a beautiful recovery I wish for everyone to be blessed who is staying there.  There are ponds to walk around and basketball court, game room and friendly dogs to pet you can go fishing, play volleyball, football, soccer. it was a very nice church service and the people were very helpful and nice

name: Judy Barnes
text: Beautiful place

name: Ashley Holladay
text: I went to visit someone there a few times and it's a nice place for guys to go if they just want a get away from their regular life. Anyone could get drugs in there. Things are not searched good so if you have a family member there bc of drugs it's not the place for them. One guy even od on heroine one evening after visits in the bathroom. If you work ar the thrift store they could also bring anything to them there.  I personally did not care for the place for that simple fact. Like I said if you just want a get away to play volleyball and basketball or even fish that's the place to go and everyone I talked to and met from workers counselors and the other men in there for different addictions or reasons were nice guys but to completely get clean and not have it around you all the time tempting you then I would try another facility. They have great intentions but have alot of things they should change and it could be a better place.

name: Robert Yost
text: The Foundry is an awesome place. Anybody that needs help with recovery in there life, this is the place to do it. Great place to find God.

resp.text: Thank you Robert for your review. May God bless you and your family!

name: Solid Rock Ministry
text: Foundry is a Wonderful place to find strength, wisdom, encouragment, love and forgiveness. The Foundry offers an opportunity to seek a new path for your future.

resp.text: Thanks Samuel for your kind words and all you have invested into The Foundry! We appreciate you!

name: Loretta Jones
text: My first time to visit and this is a amazing place that does great work helping people to have a better life good work thank you for all yall do !!!!

name: Jeff Vaughan
text: Good

name: A S
text: Thank you for all you do!

name: Genoc Genesis
text: I see Maggie Kellar and her nurse Mackenzie. They are both fantastic and very personable. I drive 45 minutes just to see them specifically. My experience with Mrs.Kellar is the best doctor/patient experience I have ever had. As long as the both of them are there I will always come back.

resp.text:
We appreciate the five-star review. Thank you for taking the time. I share this with the team!
Kindly,
April

name: melody galloway

April

name: Paula D
text: I love this office! I recently had my first appointment there in the office with Ms. kellar. The nurse mckenzie and ms Keller we’re both very kind and i could tell they really cared about me and my mental health. As long as dr kellar and McKenzie are there i will continue to come.

resp.text:
So glad you had a great experience, Paula. I will share your feedback and praise with our team. Have a wonderful day!
April

resp.text:
Hi, Gail! Thank you for the five-star review. We appreciate your kind words.
Sincerely,
April

name: Sandi Cushway
text: They completely changed my medications that I have been stable on for over 15 years (with not ever having to increase ANYTHING).  I have only seen the PA twice and she was pretty nice.  There seems to be little concern for what I, as their patient, am going through every single day as a result of their decisions.  They are making matters worse for me mentally to where I am barely functional at home or work.  The only reason I gave two stars is for the nurse, Anita.

resp.text:
Sandi, I am sorry to hear we did not meet your expectations. Your feedback will help us improve our services. If there is anything further you wish to add you can reach a member of our patient relations department at info@altapointe.org.
Kindly,
April

name: Billiam Quine
text: They have an issue with making sure their records are up to date. Their staff isn’t helpful and I’m not sure they could be even if they wanted to. Lots of “Its not my problem” going on there. Find someone else to see. Just because they may be the biggest certainly doesn’t mean they are the best.

resp.text:
Hi, Billiam. I am sorry to hear we did not meet your expectations of care. We appreciate the feedback because it will help us improve our care. If you would like to share more about your experience you can send an email to info@altapointe.org or reach our Patient Relations department at (833) 921-1811.
Kindly,
April

name: Serena kay
text: I found a place where I could get help for my autistic son that's transitioning into adulthood. It's nice to have a place we can call and talk to and get help with medications without coming across as different or weird.  They deal with these things on a daily basis and it feels good to be understood.

resp.text:
Hi, Serena Kay. Thank you for the five-star review. We appreciate you and your feedback.
Sincerely,
April

name: Shae McIntyre
text: First of all it took 3 months to get in to see a nurse practitioner to try to get different medication for my anxiety. Second, I finally get to my appointment and because I have shingles (which is a. Only contagious when the fluid in the blisters are touched but b. All of my stuff was covered and wrapped up) they said they would need to do a full decontamination sweep and I would have to get the clearance from my doctor before I can be seen  . So I spent an hour there waiting just to hear I'm the plague basically. I've never felt so offended. I already cant go to my own brothers wedding because of it but now this. I'm furious.

resp.text:
Shae, I am very sorry to hear we did not meet your expectations of care. Your feedback will help us improve our services. If you would like to provide us with additional information, you can speak to someone in our patient relations department by calling (833) 921-1810.
Kindly,
April

name: Juli Norman
text: Some of the most unkind judgmental unprofessional human beings I’ve ever met. Worst money I ever spent looking for help. Went here due to my doctor no longer being in practice and instead of getting back on my regular medications I Was accused of being under the influence by the NP I saw, being two days post op. She stated “you seem drowsy and irritable” I’m tired and in pain (since I was driving I couldn’t take my pain medication). The woman who took me back for my weight and BP answered her phone and began screaming at someone about what only I can assume was her boyfriend cheating on her. Not a single employee looked at me with a smile or made me feel welcome in the slightest. These woman look at you and judge you, they didn’t even talk to me before I felt like I wanted to run out of that building. I just wish I had read reviews before giving them my money.

resp.text:
Juli,  thanks for sharing your feedback. I am sorry your experience didn’t match your expectations. Your feedback will help us improve. Please feel free to reach out to our Patient Relations department (833) 921-1811 with any further comments, concerns, or suggestions you wish to share.
Kindly,
April

name: Ingrid Hartman
text: My family’s experience has always great!  The location is convenient, the medical staff thorough and the clinicians spend the time needed. Thank you!

resp.text: Hi, Ingrid! Thank you for the five-star review. It is our goal to deliver the utmost in care to our patients and their families so they can live their best lives.

name: Christa Bailey
text: People who come to BayView for help have issues. I was 2 minutes late and had to check in (wait for 6 minutes in line because a computer was down and I was standing there not knowing what to do and nobody would even look at me). I was told that I was 10 minutes late and my appointment is only 20 minutes long so I could reschedule or the doctor would work me in -of course I will have a no-show fee. I have never been here and not had to wait 15 minutes to see doc-I guess it’s a one way street.

name: Samantha Wade Caraway
text: DO NOT GO TO BAYVIEW! THESE PEOPLE DO NOT CARE ABOUT THEIR PATIENTS! They can not even file insurance correctly. If you don't agree with them, they will refuse to do ANYTHING for you. Their only option is to increase meds that do not work or put the patient in the hospital. If I could put ZERO stars, I would!

name: Richard Vin Zant
text: Yeah worst record keeping of any business I’ve been too.

resp.text:
Hi, Richard. I am sorry to hear we did not meet your expectations. Your feedback will help us improve our services. If you would like to provide any further information, please email us at info@altapointe.org
April

name: Jonathan Hilliard
text: The people are great for the most part. Gotta remember everyone has bad days. Some of these reviews are just plain wrong. They do offer classes and the councillor that I've had has been great. You kinda make the experience you have. Be respectful even though you feel bad. It's not their fault. Show respect get respect simple rule of thumb in general. Far better than metro when I went 15 years ago. I have no complaints about Huntsville Recovery. BHG is having some growing pains but they'll figure it out. They address every aspect of your addiction. You have to give it time and the effort for it to happen.

name: Danielle Bliss
text: If I could give a 0 or -1 stars I would. Drove there at 2 am and waited . Got up to the door walked in and WE ARE NOT TAKING NEW PATIENTS! I’ve been on percs for over 20 years and desperate. I didn’t pay for mine as a family member got me hooked so $560 amp the for Metro is out. Maybe put this on your website? Just a thought! Something you should try.

name: Hayley Irons
text: Dr Dupper has turned into a very uncaring and jaded dr. 10 years ago before she started peddling Methadone and Suboxone she was a great dr. I would not go here if I was paid. She treats everyone extremely poorly, and is super condescending. Go to Huntsville Metro where Dr Atchley at least tries to care about his patients. She needs to realize the people coming there are already at their very lowest, they don’t need her rude yankee attitude to make them feel worse.

name: Mary Wright
text: I didn't dislike it but I just needed treatment that was more than walking in and getting meds. I need the counselors, I need the specialized treatment plans and classes along with compassionate and non judgemental atmosphere.  They just didn't provide that. I have a lifelong disease called addiction and I need help that will more than likely continue for the better part of my life. This just didn't feel like the place for me. Thank you for letting me speak

name: Christopher Mack
text: I find it amazing that this place has 3 stars and the other place on Drake has 4. I have never heard a bad thing about Huntsville Recovery until I read some of the comments on here.It seems like the people that have committed badly about it safe either people who got their take homes taken away or people that are talking about things that they don't even do here. I've been coming here for over 2 years and have never gotten my take homes taken away or had any issue that wasn't solved within an appropriate amount of time. In my experience this is a great place to go. The staff is great and very helpful especially the ladies at the front desk. They have mostly great councilors they did have a pretty high turn over rate for them like 2 years ago but it's alot better now. I don't know where I would be without this place it has helped me change my life for the better and I appreciate all the people that work here.(Even when they are busy and it's taking forever to get medicine and get out lol) Thank you Huntsville Recovery for everything you've done for me and all the people that had benefited from coming there.

name: Natika Onyeka
text:
I can honestly say that they have changed my life! I have tried to get clean several times with and without the assistance of medical professionals but was unsuccessful. I finally hit my rock bottom and Huntsville Recovery was there to help me in my journey to recover. I'm so thankful and grateful to the staff for being understanding, respectful and treating me like a human being and not like I was just another drug addict. The staff is very professional and the program is definitely effective if you are sincerely ready to change.
-- Patient 3024

name: Sherry Black
text:
I just past a year of going here & I have to say, my counselor is AMAZING!
I think very highly of her, she cares about her clients & does her part in helping my recovery along! Before I had a year in I had achieved phase 4 & only have to go once a week! I go in one day a week & dose & get my 6 doses for the week to take home! Jasmin has been an awesome help to me!
THANKS JASMIN! 😘

name: Amanda Lynn
text:
Worse. Clinic. Ever.
Go to Huntsville Metro. They actually care. This place is just looking for anything to make you sicker.

name: Kevin W
text: I transferred as a patient to Huntsville Recovery today from a BHG Clinic in Tennessee. I could not believe how different Huntsville Recovery was. I was made to feel welcome, everyone was friendly "including the doctor" and it was just a completely different atmosphere overall. No business is perfect and I see the couple of bad reviews, but my experience so far has been great. I would definitely recommend HRI to a friend, family member or coworker.

name: Alan Hovexak
text: Almost as good as the metro.

name: Rachel Wilkes
text:
They refused to give my husband his take-homes due to their several failed attempts to draw blood from him, which isn't HIS fault. & He's unable to dose at the clinic every day because the dosing hours conflict with his work schedule. He's explained this to them but still they are withholding his take-homes because of their inability to draw blood on him. He can't even transfer clinics because of the incompetency in the billing department. He was unaware of his Medicaid being cut off & they still let him dose for two more months. He now owes $700+ that he has to pay back before he can even attempt to transfer clinics.
Do not waste your time here!

name: Mandy Sue
text: One of the worst places. Management failed to tell me I needed all documents for the grant, counselors are in and out,  and I overall feel that they don't care.  Currently, they're bribing people to complete reviews on the company, so here is mine. GO ELSEWHERE!

text: Great experience. I've been clean for two years. When I came to S.O.A.R. I had left another local self help because of rude behavior. The people at soar have never been rude to me. text: These people and this place saved my life. You will get back what you put in. They will work with you in every possible as long as you are serious about getting better

resp.text: We're so glad you had a positive experience!

name: Lyn Smith
text: Sincere, caring  and compassionate people that I highly recommend.

name: Lauren Donaldson
text: They do NOT care about helping anyone.  All they do is transfer your addiction and charge you thousands of dollars to do so.  You pay 150$ every single week and when they say you'll go monthly you don't. Then for them to turn around after you leave to change you 1200$$$ for drug tests! They are not organized and they don't care.

resp.text: We would love to hear from you personally about how we could help your loved one with addiction. We encourage you to call our office to talk to a recovery coach any time. Since you have never been one of our patients, allow me to correct the misinformation in your review. We charge 150.00 a month, not a week. No one has to pay or has ever had to pay for urine screens. 99 percent of patients who leave our program prematurely are a result of non-compliance.

name: Joshua Hulvey
text: The best care ive ever had!!

name: Levi James
text: My experience with The Haven is that if you want help, they are willing to go to the moon and back to help you with your addiction and addictive behaviors. If you are there just trying to get the judge or cro off your back, you are probably going to end up being discharged especially if you" don't have a problem with addictive substances " go ahead and tell them that, but it's also funny that spectracare was all against Suboxone until the guy that 21 million dollar Grant to give it out to whoever qualifies. I just don't think that I should have to pay for a drug test that you want me to take it don't make sense you're not helping anyone you can't help someone that doesn't want to be helped.

name: Brad “Kinggolddiamond1” Lott
text: They said they had called my medication in that I need so I want use other drugs and told me to tell the pharmacy to check there voice mail and the pharmacy told me they haven't ever called it in yet and now I'm without my medication thanks.

name: Miranda Hunter
text: Very friendly staff and the doctors are amazing 😍

name: Matt Walker
text: My first visit was the best , the doctors and staff there are extremely nice. I recommend that anyone battling addiction to go to them.

name: Matt Mobley
text: Very good staff. Made me feel welcome. Treats you like a person and not a drug addict.

name: gina politi
text: Wonderful Staff..Down to earth..Staff very friendly,  understanding and helpful..Dr is great, listens to your concerns..

name: I wear a Black Hat
text:
Excellent place to go. I couldn't speak more highly of a doctors office. All of the people complaining about this place, have no clue what they're talking about. You don't have to pay just cash, you can use a debit card or credit card as well. If you do have insurance they will bill the urinalysis yo your provider, but you must pay for the actual visit with your own money. All of the doctors that write the prescriptions are qualified to write them, as per state law. They're no fraud going on here, people saying that probably got in trouble for not sticking to the treatment plan, and taking something they weren't supposed to take. As long as you take it the way you're supposed to, and keep clean, then there's no reason to worry. Complaining about the price? Think how much you used to spend on street pharmacists.The cost of sobriety is cheaper than your previous life style, so be thankful for that.
This place saved my life and my marriage. I'm so happy that they helped me out. If you just needed a nudge to get yourself to go there, then this is it. Good luck!

name: Mrs Foley Linda Ruth
text: Every one there is caring. From the time you walk in until you leave. I was greeted warmly, treated with respect. I recommend this clinic to anyone with chronic pain. They were there when I had no where else to go. Thank you medplex!

name: BTA “bta2997” RACING
text: Great Dr's

name: Grey Hoover
text: I am always very satisfied when I come here. They always get me an appointment in super fast within only a couple of days. The longest I've ever had to wait is one hour from the time I walk in the door until the time I walk out. They are very courteous, confidential and they are sensitive and caring to my specific healthcare needs.

name: Kaila Miller
text: Love this place.  They are all very nice and caring doctors. Never had a problem and never have to wait long at all. I'm always there only an hour or less.

name: Anthony Cornelius
text: This place is shady. They are expensive and require you to pay cash. They don't except insurance for payment yet want you to provide it to them so they can charge drug testing to it after you have paid the doctor bill. WTF? When you ask about it you can't get a straight answer. They have also violated HIPA laws by giving out my personal information in a waiting room full of people.

name: Karen Kirkpatrick
text: This place is a joke! All they do is take your money and continue to write prescriptions.  Even if you test positive they just write more scripts. Only go there if you plan to be addicted forever.

name: Ryan Floyd
text: Fast and easy amd doctors really care about helping you

name: Coach Jimmy
text: All of my Doctors have dropped me because I went here for PAIN treatment ...once you get a prescription of suboxone you are automatically labeled a drug addict nobody warned me!!!

name: Stacy Upton
text: It has saved my life

name: Randi Capleton
text: Horrible clinic! They do file to your insurance and they also sent me a bill every month for the urine test. I had to get a lawyer to have the lab charges taken away. Find another clinic if you can.

name: Alicia Minze
text: On December 2017 I went to this clinic, I paid $225 out of pocket for the visit now I get a bill of 150$ from the drug test ( a different company no one told me about when I came in or called for my visit, very MAD!!!!!

name: Gd Ford
text: I had been a smoker for 40 plus years. I smoked a pack a day and tried to quit numerous times. The hazzle of not being able to walk to my mailbox without getting out of breath is now a thing in my past. I am now able to walk to my mailbox without loosing my breath. Not only am I now a non smoker but I have even been sleeping better. Thanks to Robertsdale Hypnosis for making me a nonsmoker!

name: Reunion Pointe
text: Diets? I have been on all of them.   Even though I never gave up hope of better health and more beautiful shape, I was totally blown away by how hypnosis helped me achieve results with absolutely no diet at all.   I thought I was happy this morning when I put on jeans I hadn’t been able to wear for years but happier when the shorts I wore yesterday came off without unbuttoning or unzipping them.   My husband commented the shorts need to hit the donation bag! This is a journey and I still have a ways to go.   I see the road ahead as an easy one to navigate.

name: Annette Nolan
text:
When I started this weight loss program I was 156 pounds and a size 12.  8 sessions later, I am 146 pounds and a very comfortable size 10!  With 13 inches GONE!

And the best part is I’ve been able to maintain that loss (and add to it) over time... even over Thanksgiving. No more YO-YO dieting for me! Hypnosis works so much better than any diet.

It isn’t magic but the audio tapes I use in my program make me feel more alive... more confident. Even 2 weeks after listening to them I felt like I came out from under a rock - I was more aware and hopeful for my ultimate success - which is a size 8. I have only 15 more pounds to go and I’m very sure I’ll reach that goal in the next 3 months, then I’m set!!! I can’t wait.

I’m surprised at how much more energy I have, I’m sleeping better and my stress level is much better.

In truth, Not all hypnotists are created equally. I did see a hypnotist a few times 25 years ago... but he was not nearly as professional and didn’t give me anywhere near the support, information or products that I have here. Robertsdale Hypnosis even has a service guarantee. As long as I was accepted into a program, they will stick with me until I get my goal weight as long as I follow instructions! Can’t beat that.

I’ve decided to be on one of their ads as soon as I lose the rest of the weight! Look for me there!!

name: minoley1
text:
I just finished my first hypnosis session to stop smoking and WOW!!!!  My stress level was about a 10 before I came to Robertsdale Hipnosis. After just one session it is truly zero. My mind is so relaxed, it almost seems like my problems are only half as bad, and I truly do not want a cigarette. I'M DONE!

I admit Iwas a little doubtful if this would work at first.  More than anything I just wanted to feel like I didn't want a cigarette anymore. And it's weird! I really feel that way now! I am so glad I made myself call for my free screening. This is so worth it. Try it! it might change your life. It did for mine.

name: Tasha Johnson
text: I had never done anything like this before but after one session I actually quit smoking! I smoked a pack, sometimes more a day for 11 years! I have tried everything to quit, patches, lozenges, all of it!  Absolutely the best experience and best decision I ever made. I feel 10x better and healthier. The hypnosis has helped me with my confidence and anxiety also. If your on the fence and not sure if it something you want to do, do it! Julie is wonderful!

name: Crystal Moye
text:
The thing I wanted to know the most when I came here was how it worked for people. I was done with diets that don't work and I really wanted to learn to eat like a thin person.

Besides learning that, I also found out how to get rid of stress and calm down in my head.
I was surprised how much my sleep improved from the first day which makes my life a whole lot calmer.  My husband has noticed I'm more relaxed and active and he's happy with the results so far.

What's really cool is already I'm only eating HALF of what I used to, and it's not because
I "have to" it's because I WANT to and that is a huge change.

My advice to someone looking at coming here is there are so many benefits and things you learn about yourself when you come here, you shouldn't miss it!

name: Chris Roberson
text: I gotta tell the truth..  I am the most skeptical  person you will ever meet.  I was really doubtful  about hypnosis  and whether or not it really worked  It kinda seemed  like it was just gimmicky.  However I smoked all the way up until my appointment  time at 3PM.  When my first session  was complete I walked out and had zero, I mean zero desire for a cigarette!  I haven't smoked in 3 weeks now and have no desire to.  I am a believer!  I was a smoker for 35 years! I am  a non smoker  now, for the rest of my life! Julie is awesome! I will save in 3 months of not smoking what I paid for the sessions! It is totally worth it!

name: Mrs. Araza
text:
yesterday I went out and bought a size 9 because I can no longer fit in my size 15s any more! This is only my 5 session in my weight lost program... its helped me start exercising more eating right and finding foods I like to eat healthy more... its helped me become healthier on the inside with my heart and soul to get me to where I've lost two pant sizes....

I came in to this with an open mind because I new a few other people that have done hypnosis on to quit smoking and it work same a losing weight... to this day for 10 years they haven't touched a cigarette... as well as the people I know that have done weight lose has stayed small with out gaining any weight back....

I'm sooo excited to get back to where i was before my stroke it has been a big challenge for over a year and a half to lose my weight that I gained because of it... im very happy that I've done the hypnosis if it was it for them i would still be lost...

I'm very thankful ive met her and came to this location. I live in CA/AZ and decided to come here in Alabama. I'm sooo thankful i met her and worked with her!

Thank you sooooo very much for all this work...

name: Ginger Placente
text: Last Sunday I went to church in a smaller size pair of pants and I was very happy. That was only after four sessions of hypnosis to lose weight. I am surprised at the amount of progress this early in the program because I am not on a diet, or restricting what I eat. It just seems to be happening very easy. Next I am going to get a cute little summer dress. It's been years since I have done that. I'm excited.

resp.text: That's awesome! It won't be long before you're a member of the Little Black Dress club!

name: Sarah Hermetz
text: It has given me a new life style. I wasn't this thin in middle school. I am in a place where I can live a full and healthy lifestyle, not only in my weight but with my self. Thank You Julie!!

resp.text: Thank you so much for your review of Robertsdale Hypnosis! We are so pleased you are working for your goals.

name: Ron Dumas
text: I am really interested in hypnosis as an alternative to some limited things like diets. I am here to lose weight,, control my state of mind and get more energized and organized. I believe Julie and Robertsdale Hypnosis can and will help me with these challenges and make me a better and happier person. this will Help me be healthier, happier and more focused with a lot less stress.

resp.text: We are most pleased to be here with you, hand-in-hand as you seek a better you! Thanks for trusting us to join you in this decision.

name: Ginny Stopa
text: This is only my fourth session but just last week I put on a bathing suit for  the first time in over two years. I’m also wearing sleeveless tops because of how many inches I’ve lost already. I have found that it takes WAY less food to make be satisfied at each meal and I never feel deprived. I am so glad I found hypnosis-it is easy and so fun. And I get great results.

resp.text: We are so glad you are with us as well! We are excited for your best future yet!

name: Diane Diane
text: In session 1 I was scared - this was unknown to me and I wondered if hypnosis would work for me. By the 2nd session, NINE THINGS had improved or changed for the better! Wow! In session 3 we did a great technique to get me out of dieting thinking and during that, I began to clearly and easily visualize myself as the thin person I want to be. In fact, I put a picture of a thinner me in a BATHING  SUIT in the screen of my phone to remind me where I’m headed. Who would have thought I could come so far in such a short time! Today is session 4, and I told Julie that last week was a little crazy because I actually had a heart attack! I’m fine now, but of course all my friends brought giant piles of food over to hep me recover. It used to be I would have dived in to all of it, especially the sweets. Instead, none of the sweets interested me. It wasn’t that I wanted them but  “couldn’t” or “shouldn’t” have them - I genuinely didn’t want them. That’s gotta be the hypnosis changing my food preferences, and it was so easy. It is working for me. At week 4 I’m feeling so confident in where I’m going. I’m going to be a size 8, and that’s just how it’s going to go!!

resp.text: YAY! Keep going. Your health will continue to improve as long as you focus on the prize and take each day as the amazing opportunity it is!

name: Bill Nassar
text: We are very pleased with the outcome here at Robertsdale Hypnosis with my step son. It was amazing to see how quickly he relaxed - more so than he has been in years.  i was really skeptical at first, but this isn't like on TV! instead, it gives the tools to be more confident and calm. you rally learn how-to relax, and then so many more thipngs are possible. The office is very professional and the people really know what they're doing,  We got the anxiety relief help we were seeking and are very glad we came. Thank you so much!

resp.text: Thank you for trusting us with your relief! It is the highest compliment to know that we placed you at ease and you enjoyed your visit in our office.

name: Ann Morris
text: I knew hypnosis would be the answer because I tried everything else! I smoked for 55 years up until June 6th. That was my first hypnosis session and I stopped smoking forever. I'm very proud of that date. It was so relaxing, and I found out I was aware of everything, and I felt calmly in control the whole time. The thing I like best about being a non-smoker is I have so much more energy and since my mind isn't racing, I can make decisions better. I like to brag, and everybody who knows me has heard me say, "I'm a NON SMOKER!!" Oh, and I've already saved 75% of what it cost just because I'm not buying cigarettes any more. In a year, I'll have enough to take a cruise! This worked so well, I'd do it again tomorrow.

resp.text: Congratulations! Stay with it and don't loose any ground.

name: thegreenantllc Brandy55
text: My grown son has severe anxiety and depression. We took the normal path for treatment and got improvement but he was still unable to live a normal life. We found Julie at Robertsdale Hypnosis and made the decision to see if hypnosis could help.  With only 3 sessions behind us he is much more relaxed and comfortable handling interactions with others. I reccomend anyone suffering from anxiety or other debilitating conditions to give hypnosis a try, it is certainly working for us.

resp.text: Thank you for this word of encouragement! It's so important to note every situation is different and we love recognizing the needs of every client. We are so excited by the path your son is on.

name: Stacie Willis
text: I went there and it really was like no one cared about me but only getting their money I had been through so much before I got there I was abused by my boyfriend and abandoned by my own family not to mention I was on drugs ,I had a roommate that was stealing from the center and they punished me not her I had the worst client rep she only cared about the ones who had money.. I left the center and got clean all on my own without their help I mean I tried to ask for help no one wanted to hear my story Brenda just ignored my cry for real help I never relapsed the whole time I was there.. I’d never refer someone to that money making place they don’t care about you only the money....

name: Mandy Armitage
text: I have never met 2 women that have hearts as big and genuine as Mrs. Brenda and Mrs. Malinda... The Lovelady Center changed my life and gave me all the tools to utilize out in the world to remain sober and drug free. My relationship with my kids has been restored and I now have a handsome grandson that I am able to spend lots of time with. Had I not went to The Lovelady Center there is no telling if I would even still be alive. Thank you so much for all that you have done for me Mrs. Brenda and Mrs. Malinda. I am now a much stronger, happier, independent woman and I was able to become this woman with the help that The Lovelady Center gave me. This a picture of my most handsome and wonderful grandson. Thank you Lord for The Lovelady Center!!

name: Angela Edwards
text: Man, this place is so amazing!! Everyone is just so nice here, and they love u so much... This place has taught me how to live life without drugs. I learned how to love myself ❤️ I wouldn't wanna be anywhere else. We're one big family, here at the lovelady center it doesn't matter where you come from, They take you in and treat you like family, they even let you have your sweet babies here . We have a church and a kid zone . Transportation and walmart trips 👌🏼 , Im currently in phase 4 of 5 . I'll be forever thankful for the lovelady and staff . N the best part is they are christian based ✝️🙌🏼

name: Gabriel Bruzzi
text: My daughter has some mental issues and addictive drug issues as well. She had been there years ago for what she was going thru back then. They took her back again with open arms as she is going thru allot now. They called me to let me know she got there ok from Amtrak as they picked her up. I pray and hope she gets the help that they can provide for her. Having the word of God is such great help as well.

name: Michael Ganey
text: From Hevan was sent the lady's running the love lady center. They have saved and changed my wife's life. And with the power of God backing the ladies, nothing can stop them. God Bless you all. Thank You !!!!!

name: Jessica Kuerner
text: We scheduled a donation pickup and they called the day before to confirm, but then never showed up!  For several days we had to haul it out to the driveway and then haul it back in so it wouldn't get rained on, and they were so rude on the phone when we tried to confirm they were ever going to come get it!  Why bother calling us the day before and then not show up?  Luckily there are many other organizations in Birmingham that are responsive and grateful for donations, like The Exchange Club!

name: David Melton
text: What a load this place is. I cant recommend using Lovelady to make donations. They’ll call and tell you a truck will be in your area accepting donations for pickup but then they never show up. Then they’ll call you to reschedule, but they still won’t show up. I had several boxes of my mother’s clothes waiting outside for six days for them to pick up. When they finally did show, they picked up a couple small items and left everything else with a note saying they I needed to call again to reschedule. Only problem is, the next few days rain was expected so I had to haul everything back into the house. I’ve called several times since then and they won’t answer, ignore my calls, or send me to voicemail. So exhausting dealing with them. It’s almost like they get off on stringing me along but I’m not gonna beg them to come pick up my stuff. They should be the ones asking me. Oh wait, that’s right they did ask me when they called in the first place. Yeah, right. Good luck with that. I wanted to donate my mother’s clothing. She passed a way a few month’s ago and would have wanted it that way. But I can’t deal with the ineptitude, incompetence, and unreliability of Lovelady.

name: Steph Casey
text: Tonia Silas do you not understand what it means to work for your room and board?  Tell me where on Earth (other than jail) that you can go live for free? It is a shame that you are not the first person to come to the Lovelady with that attitude and you probably won't be the last. I've got news for you though; until you get real about living a productive life, supporting yourself and not blaming everyone else for all of your problems your life is not gonna change. There are many people in this world that do not care about you, your circumstances or your salvation, but Miss Brenda and Miss Melinda actually do.

name: Stephanie Casey
text: I love the Lovelady! I am grateful that this place exists to help people like myself. I am disappointed to hear people badmouth this place when there are such good people doing their best to cater to our every need. We need a place to stay? We got it. A soft, warm bed? We got it. Food to eat? We've got it. Clothing? We got it. Someone to talk to? (in the form of amazing counselors and client reps)-we've got it. Transportation? We've got it. Healthcare services? We've got it. Family legal assistance? We've got it. Stop complaining! I'm a firm believer that we are a family-a family of survivors...and a family in Christ. Stop talking bad about my family!

name: Dennis Turnbaugh
text: First of all I need to apologize to Ms. Brenda and Ms. Melinda for the review I posted 11 months ago! My wife graduated from TLC in January 2018. When she arrived April 2017 she was pregnant, and broken. She was sent on a court order which infuriated me. Neither of us realized how badly she needed to go to The Lovelady! My 2 children went there to live with her in June 2017, and our 3rd baby arrived August 2017. Had she not gone to TLC, she wouldn't have learned to live first for God and the rest would fall into place, nor would I. Even after moving out of the center they are still there for her, they're there for us! The people are amazing people of God and are an amazing support system!! They're still our family and friends and to be honest, we've never known friends, love, and support the way they've shown to our family! God knows what he's doing, and he sent my wife there for a reason. Had he not, I don't know where my family would be today. Many thanks and much love to all of the folks at The Lovelady Center!

name: Leah Logan
text: I love it here!

name: Brenda Sullivan
text: MY NAME IS BRENDA SULLIVAN McCLENEY AND I WAS SENT TO THE LOVE LADY CENTER BY THE STATE OF ALABAMA ON THE SUPERVISED RELEASE PROGRAM WHERE I SPENT MY LAST 9 MONTHS OF INCARCERATION THERE.. I MUST ADMIT THAT WHEN I FIRST ARRIVED IT WAS VERY OVERWHELMING...AFTER SPENDING SOME TIME WITH THE AMAZING PEOPLE THAT OWN AND RUN THE LOVE LADY THE OVERWHELMING FEELING THAT I HAD WAS REPLACED WITH THE FEELING OF PEACE AND MY WHOLE LIFE HAS BEEN CHANGED BECAUSE OF THIS PLACE!!!MRS BRENDA,,MRS MALINDA AND MY BEAUTIFUL CLIENT REP MRS TAMMY PORTER SHOWED ME MORE LOVE THAN I COULD EVER HAVE IMAGINED AND MADE ME WANT TO BE A BETTER PERSON!! THIS PLACE HAS TAKEN ME FROM PRISONER TO PRINCESS AND I THANK GOD FOR THE OPPORTUNITY TO BE ONE OF MRS BRENDAS MANY LOVE LADY SUCCESS STORIES...

name: Kayla Brown
text: I as well as my daughter lived at the Lovelady center as I went through the program! If a person wants a new life the opportunity is there! Mrs Brenda, Melinda and the rest of the staff were always there to help! My daughter enjoyed the time there as she got to make friends and play as I sometimes worked in the Education and Kids zone! I would recommend this place to anyone seeking second chances and a sober life! Most of all they offer HOPE and LOVE as well as support!!! Assisted me in my court cases and even today I stand strong and sober without my Gods love my will and their “whole-way house” I would not be where I am today! Thanks Mrs Brendan and Melinda for having that vision where women in need may get that last chance to live and have a free life!

name: Joseph Willingham
text: Amazing place! This place brings women and children to God and sobriety.  To me that is sacred grounds. Addiction is the filthiest place on Earth and i hear people on here talking about dirty rugs.This is spiritual boot camp not the Hilton. if you have a problem with the rugs or playground then go volunteer. Otherwise just sit back and watch the miracle of God"s work. This is a huge opportunity for someone that is willing to put forth the work of learning to have a better life.

text: I have no clue who R is but I am a Lovelady and they have never charged me or my family for my meds.

My name was Susan Edgil at the time.  After graduating I continued to live on the 4th floor working on into 2008... I believe I left in March 2008. They provide EVERYTHING NEEDED TO PREPARE TO LIVE YOUR LIFE CLEAN AND SOBER... BUT YOU HAVE TO WANT IT.  IM STILL CLEAN AND SOBER...13 YEARS AND COUNTING!

text: This place has been absolutely  amazing and has already began to work miracles and restoration in my life and with my children from broken to blessed this program truly works if you are ready for a life change and are ready to make that commitment  for yourself then this is definitely  the place to be everyone here is so full of love and support.

text: Loved this place!  Great people and wonderful staff that helped me so much!  Mrs. Brenda will always have a special place in my heart for all that she did for me!!!! 💜💜💜💜

name: Tom Dooley
text: As a volunteer on the pastoral team I've witnessed first-hand this amazing "whole-way house" holistic program.  Each week I speak with dozens of women who are being transformed from addicts and incarcerated individuals into precious Loveladies.  This is an exemplary faith-based recovery center.  ti works.

name: Maranda&Paul Godwin
text: My name is Maranda Harville. I was incarcerated in 2011, 2012 for drug related problems. My life was great BUT I didnt know it! I've been reading what some of the ladies have said about this place so I decided to tell my story!!! THANK GOD! THAT I WAS SENT HERE. My community corrections officer an my mom an dad found this place for me. I was afraid an overwhelmed just like a few others, in the beginning! Not completely knowing what to expect an being away from everything and everyone I knew. That was key tho, an very soon into my journey I would find this out. The date that I am writing this is May2nd2019 an I have been COMPLETELY 100% clean an sober since the day i walked out of this place. 1st an foremost it takes a desire to change. 2nd it takes help. An 3rd it takes a higher power! Speaking for myself and only myself I found all of these things here at THE LOVELADY! God has always been a huge part of my life BUT I refound Him here. You see even tho He never left me I NOT ONLY LOST MYSELF IN MY ADDICTION I LOST HIM. An IN RECOVER YOU HAVE TO HAVE A HIGHER POWER!!! I choose for mine to be God! Mrs.Brenda, Mrs.Melinda, Ms.Brandi, an i definitely cant forget Pastor Lesley an Pastor Mullins! An so many more from admin to exit! I cant say enough good about them all. All of them have made it possible for females like me to learn how to live again. Of course there is some bad BUT all in all it was a great experience FOR ME! I was reading a post from a Ms.Silas an I completely disagree. The foodstamp stuff and the thrift store stuff is completely untrue! This program is Blessed, The Hand of God is on this place because they do so much good! There was a store where you could treat yourself an they do take foodstamps for your convenience. They do try an get you back out into the working world BUT IF YOU HAVE ISSUES THEN YOU CAN WORK WITHING THE FACILITY! Ms.Silas failed to tell you how you do schooling you can have your children here, they can go to school as well. So many good things an I will stand firm on this!!! THANK YOU LOVELADY CENTER! TO ALL WHO WERE THSRE WHEN I WAS THERE AN TO ALL WHO ARE THERE STILL AN NOW... CONTINUE TO DO WHAT YOU DO!!! IF WE WANT CHANGE IT CAN BE FOUND HERE!!!

name: Cindy Isaacs
text: I have watched miracle after miracle turn women's lives around.  This establishment is great for any woman that wants to turn her life around.

name: Kimberly Pickron
text: This place is truly God's house.. Amazing

name: Lisa
text: I have learned who I was..who I am and who i will become! This place has changed my life and the people here have become my family!

text: There are pros and cons. Some good programs offered. But the mold and mildew make even the staff sick.I called the health dept to no avail. I called the state rep for that area and within an hour my dau. -in-law was kicked out for an offense that wasn't proven.The food is mostly donated expired food that isn't safe to eat.  And they get and keep 100% of each girls food stamps. Item donated  are then sold to the girls. And they charge family members for drugs paid for by medicaid and medicare.

text: I called the Center last week to report a problem with a patient. The operator said she would have someone call me and I could tell her what happened. The return call never came. I have been a supporter for this center for years, am a christian countsler for girls with hurts and hang ups. resp.text: Thank you for letting us know about your experience and we are very sorry to hear you were not satisfied with our services.  IHS is committed to following all federal and state laws/regulations.  In the state of Alabama, a fourteen-year-old is given the right to consent to treatment which means it is up to them on what information is disclosed.  While this may seem unfair and may not make sense, we are obligated to follow all federal and state regulations.

name: L K
text:
She values money over her client’s wellbeing. I missed one appointment for extenuating circumstances, and my credit card was charged $140. I very nicely asked for one grace period, and I was vulnerable to her about my situation. She said I could do a payment plan, and I agreed. I also emailed her though that I would prefer to find another therapist that cares more about their patient’s wellbeing over money considering there is a global pandemic, and everyone is struggling. Since then, she has not responded to my emails in order to help get the charge off my credit card for the payment plan.

Part of working with people who are working on themselves should be showing grace in times of need.

resp.text: Integrative Health Services, LLC requires every client to sign an agreement stating they understand they will be charged for a no show or a later cancellation. We allow up to a twenty four hour notice for cancellations. Our policy also notes exceptions for medical issues such as being sick where we excuse a no show or late cancel but the client must meet the requirements for this as outlined in the policy. We want every client to be happy with our services and we give everyone the opportunity to decline working with us if they disagree with our no show late cancellation policy.

name: Johnny Butler
text:
I have been seeing Dr.Go for a many many years. I have always appreciated the way he and his staff takes care of his patients. So yesterday 2/24/2021, I had a problem, post visit with my prescriptions getting filled. Basically the pharmacy didn't have my prescription. So when I used the telephone to call back into the doctors office, I felt like I wasn't going to be able to be helped properly. Not because of unprofessional staff or them having a desire to not help me. But because its a doctors office during a pandemic on top of already taking care of patients.
So I went online and began reading reviews. One response I kept reading was "did you try messaging us on social media or direct thru our website"? So that was what I decided to do. Now it was after 6pm when I messaged and just a few hours later I got a response. You may think getting a response at 9pm seems bad, but let me tell you. When your in need of help, getting a response at 9pm let me know that Go medical is taking care of their patients.
So now here we are at 930am the following morning and my problem has been resolved. Thanks Go medical. I could not be more pleased with your quick help. A million thanks over!
Johnny Butler

resp.text: Thank you.

name: Miranda McCowan
text:
I’m rating again after having consistent care for 6+ months by Dr Go. In the beginning I was heard, I was treated for my conditions, everything was going fine in my life other than one issue.(5⭐️ then) Until my last appointment, I didn’t even see Dr.Go after being told that’s who I would be seeing that day. I seen a Np that knows NOTHING about me or my conditions & who was rude and kept cutting me off, wouldn’t even listen to what I had to say, She was hateful to me both times I was seen by her. She laughed at my concerns the first time. The second time she treated me like a liar and someone just fishing w/out allowing me to talk to inform her on what Dr. Go and I had discussed about MY issues and what actions we had taken so far. She admitted that she didn’t know what my apt was even for. Dr. Go stopped one RX, that is REALLY dangerous to just quit prescribing to a patient “Cold Turkey.” It states on the FDA website,& medical professionals that tapering IS necessary, I wasn’t tapered at all. I wasn’t I informed at my previous appointment with Dr. Go that I would no longer receive this RX. I didn’t even get my own choice on which I believed my body/mind needed more to have quality of life. Along with the only testing/imaging that was ever ordered was ultrasound and CT which my disease won’t show up on neither one of those as that has been proven by many other medical experts. Nothing further was even discussed to get an accurate diagnoses. Sent me for a CT with dye knowingly that I have a allergy to contrast dye and I had to be treated at the ER because of this and have my husband come 30 miles away to drive me b/c they didn’t check my chart before ordering the scan. Dr. Go has always treated me w/respect and mostly listened to concerns. There was a few times I felt like he was only concerned about a symptom we’ve already discussed when I had multiple concerns that was never addressed. I paid $70 copay to be seen every time besides once therefore I should see Dr. Go. He did help me for 6+ months, especially with my anxiety, etc, but now that my anxiety meds was removed w/o me even being informed my anxiety is @ it’s worse since I lost my dad & two miscarriages this past year. If I was told last month, I could of tapered myself knowing that you need to safely be tapered from any barbiturate. So I felt reeled in at the start. I didn’t break any rules or anything to cause this, either. My first apt I went I was told I would be seeing DR. Go, I didn’t see him that day either. That day was with another NP, Dr. McDaniel, who I DO recommend if you go and have to see a NP. She truly did listen to my concerns and try her best to treat me in the best way allowed, I’d solely give her a star alone, but again I was told by the front that day I’d be seeing Dr. Go & didn't. Normally most DRs would have you come back in two/four weeks to monitor how the meds are working/if they need to be adjusted/changed, to check on how you’re doing with them.  I was really disappointed in the care I received from the office my last visit. I’ve been referring a lot of people to this office, but now I’m unsure if that’s the right thing to do. I truly hope this was just a mistake on the NP side & when I do go back I can see DR GO HIMSELF & discuss options or I will be looking for a different PCP to receive the help to accommodate me. I truly don’t want to do that, but I don’t want to continue to throw away $70 with nothing accomplished, really. MOST of the staff has good bedside manner,a few that could use more discipline as JOKING ab patients after they leave & their private health info is very unprofessional.

•
•

Update: to the response, thank you for replying. I am not meaning my review to be hateful. I’m adding a star since you took the time to look into this for me and replied. I have been satisfied the care I’ve received prior to this day, that’s why I said I didn’t want to change PCP without seeing Dr. Go first to tell him how I am feeling about my last appointment. Hopefully we can get it solved.

resp.text: Will make sure that Dr. Go see you on your next visit. He was swamped with patients that day.
